title: Buongiorno Italia! Programs 1-10
brief_description: A double video set containing ten 25 minute episodes, programs 1 to 10, of the Italian language instruction program, “Buongiorno Italia!”. Contents: 1. How to greet people and ask for something. 2. How to ask where something is. 3. Buying things and asking the price. 4. How to say you like something. 5. Revision. 6. Going places. 7. Getting there and looking around 8. Finding a room. 9. Eating out. 10. Revision. See also “Buongiorno Italia!: programs 11-20” and “Buongiorno Italia! [kit]”.
